title: add docs for using `python setup.py clean` in developing mode
body_html: This command (suggested by @albanD when I raised a related question in pytorch slack) is super useful to me. I have used it several times and it worked like a charm (without it, I have to delete entire pytorch folder and clone things again). So I guess it is nice to have in the CONTRIBUTING doc.
